dialogueText: With the Dreamless defeated, you look around for Dorothy again.
Perhaps she's hiding because of the Dreamless?
Perhaps she isn't hiding but the Dreamless have already...
No... she must be hiding. That's right! She's definitely hiding.
Right?
Why would you think that, Dreamer?
Dorothy pops up behind you, giving you a bit of a shock!
Oh, sorry Dreamer... I wasn't trying to scare you.
But I'm a little bit peeved that you think these weak Dreamless could take me down!
Ah! You're sorry... but you haven't been here long and you don't know how many, or what kind of Dreamless have invaded.
Well, I'll admit, some of them are pretty scary... but I haven't been hiding from them!
I've been trying to maintain this place as it has started to disintegrate.
That explains the feeling you had earlier... Is it because of the Dreamless?
Of course! The Dreamless as well as another... ummm, outside influence?
I created this dream as a refuge to hide from the Dreamless in Phantasia, but I wasn't expecting to see you here... twice, now!
But, wait... isn't this YOUR dream? The dream that Dracula forced you into?
Hmmm, yes, that is very strange... Perhaps the two dream worlds have collided somehow?
Or perhaps all of this is in your head, after all!
Or maybe it's all in mine and I'm back in my bed in Kansas.
Dreams can be very confusing, can't they, Dreamer?
Uhh, yes...
Wait, 'Kansas'?
Why does that name ring a bell to you...? Where was Dorothy originally from? Is Kansas in Phantasia somewhere?
Oh, no, I come from the realm of Oz... but Oz has long since fallen into the Dreamless Nether.
But... originally, I was from somewhere outside Phantasia.
Just like you, I think?
Well... you don't really know where you're from, originally.
But did Dorothy ever try to escape Phantasia and return to wherever she was from? Kansas, was it?
I did try... I used my silver slippers to transport me back to Kansas...
But during the transportation I became... stuck.
Stuck?
Yes... in the boundary around Phantasia...
I found I could go no further away from this world.
And while I was stuck there, I started to feel myself begin to... dissipate. I don't think I can really describe the feeling well.
Like I was a piece of ice slowly dissolving in a warm glass of lemonade?
That sounds terrible!
It was frightening... but it was also peaceful. And I thought I heard sounds and saw sights that might have been the world beyond Phantasia.
It didn't look like Kansas...
There were people moving, urgent voices, the wail of some kind of fearsome monster... an repetitive squeaking sound, like a very persistent mouse... and then...
And then?
And then time seemed to stop for me.
In that infinite moment, I somehow became aware that Oz was falling into the Dreamless Nether.
So, using all the strength and willpower I possessed, I wrenched myself out of that boundary, back towards Phantasia.
But I got back too late to save Oz... It had already broken away from Phantasia and was drifting away into the Nether, along with all its people
That's terrible... to lose so many people all at once...
I thought so, too. So... I had to do something, right?
What did she do?

I used up all my remaining strength, every bit of power I had in this world, and I created this place, this dreamworld. A place separated from Phantasia, but still linked to it and to where Oz had once stood.
It took everything I had, but I managed it.
But what about the people, where did they go?
The people are all around you, Dreamer, held in suspended animation in the fabric of this dream.
That's why everything here is so static and unchanging. It's all held, frozen in time, waiting for the time that all of Oz's people can return to Phantasia.
Though, that can only happen if Oz is restored...
The people of Oz have been trapped here since their realm was destroyed?
Yes... they don't know it, they can't feel anything. They're all frozen in an instant of time, supposedly unchanging. Supposedly...
But something has changed.
What?
Dorothy points.
Those Dreamless, they shouldn't be here.
찢어진 공간에서 드림리스가 나타나는 건 처음 있는 일이 아니지만
이 드림리스들은 유독 그 기세가 사납고 우울했다.
심연에서 곧바로 튀어나온 종류라서 그런 걸까?
피크닉 바구니에서 꺼낸 소스 통을 드림리스에게 집어 던지던 도로시가 장난스레 웃었다.
드림리스가 그 소스 통을 쫓아 오솔길 반대쪽으로 몰려간다.
드림리스가 사라지는 마법~ 이랍니다. 신기하죠~?
뭘 어떻게 한 거지?
와아, 그 정도로 놀란 거예요?
네게 보여주길 잘했네요~ 열심히 연구한 보람이 있어요~
도로시가 내 손을 붙잡고 균열 반대편으로 이끈다.
쪼오끔~ 무서운 드림리스가 있긴 있었는데요~
지금은 내가 쫓아냈답니다~ 사이좋게 지낼 방법이 전혀! 없지 뭐예요~
그건 가볍게 웃는 얼굴로 할 말이 아닌 것 같은데...
하여간, 이렇고 저런 사정 때문에 그렇게 되었으니까~
공간 분리를 분명히! 제대로 해두었는데요~ 이상하죠~? 도로시, 혹시 재능이 없다든지~?
공간을 분리한다고? 이해할 수 없는 말을 쏟아내던 도로시가 숲속으로 폴짝 뛰어들었다.
이쪽이에요, 꿈꾸는 친구~ 길을 잃어버리면 곤란하니까 잘 따라와 주세요~
여기는 내가 임시로 만들어 낸 공간이거든요~
오즈와 도로시의 꿈 일부를 살짝~ 잘라다가 두 개로 합쳐두었어요.
그런데 꿈꾸는 친구가 여기 있는 걸 보면, 뭔가 더 섞였을지도~?
숲속에는 작은 구두 모양의 장식물들이 여기저기 떨어져 있었다.
도로시가 지팡이나 발끝으로 그것들을 치워주었지만,
불길한 특유의 느낌은 그대로였기 때문에 시선이 가는 것은 어쩔 수 없었다.
너무 오래 보지 말아요, 꿈꾸는 친구~ 이건 다 드림리스거든요.
내가 임의로 미니어처 구두처럼 바꿔둔 거예요~ 아까 말한 것처럼, 공간을 잘라 합치면서요~
아! 혹시 오즈의 세계가 드림리스 네더에게 흡수당한 것부터 설명을 해주는 게 좋을까요~?
그런 일을 할 수 있는 메르헨이 있다고?
그랬다면 왜 아무도 내게 말해주지 않았던 거지?
그야 도로시도 도로시가 이런 일을 할 수 있는 줄 몰랐으니까요~?
모르는 걸 친구에게 말해줄 수는 없잖아요~
지팡이 끝으로 미니어처 구두를 잘게 부순 도로시가 살짝 인상을 찌푸린다.
이건 내가 캔자스...
그러니까 판타지아의 밖에서 온 사람이기 때문에 가능한 것 같아요~
원래는 불가능했었는데, 판타지아 밖으로 빠져나갈 수 없게 되면서 신기한 능력이 생겼거든요.
이 세계도 그 힘을 응용해서 만든 거예요, 도로시~ 대단하죠~?
검지 손가락을 입가에 가져다 댄 도로시가 고개를 갸웃거렸다.
원래 판타지아의 경계는 좀 넘기 힘들게 만들어지긴 했었는데~
마법의 구두가 있으면 어렵지 않게 들어올 수 있었거든요?
지금은 판타지아의 경계와 대륙 사이에 심연이 생기면서 뭔가 뒤틀린 것 같아요.
가끔 나타나는 균열이 그 심연과 연관되어 있을 가능성은?
꿈꾸는 친구는 엉뚱한 생각을 잘하네요~
하지만 불가능한 이야기는 아니죠, 드림리스는 심연에서 태어나고 있으니까요~
여하간, 돌아가는 게 불가능하다는 걸 안 직후에 다시 오즈의 세계로 돌아가려고 했는데요~
어라라~? 도로시의 지름길을 드림리스 네더가 냉큼! 써버린 거 아니겠어요~?
우리는 어느새 오솔길의 끝에 도착했다.
마법사 씨랑 글린다가 열심히 노력해 준 것 같지만, 으음...
그녀가 허공에 노크하듯 손을 두어 번 톡톡 두드린다.
도로시가 오즈의 세계에 도착했을 때는 이미 가망이 없어 보였어요, 마법사 씨도 글린다도 친구들도 보이지 않고...
그래서, 어쩔 수 없이~ 살짝 반칙을 해버렸다고 해야 하나~?
아무것도 없던 장소에 고풍스러운 형태의 문이 나타났다.
꿈꾸는 친구~ 아까 내가 이야기했던 말, 기억하고 있나요?
도로시의 꿈과 오즈의 세계 일부를 잘라서 합쳐 놓았다는 거요.
이 세계는 그런 장소예요. 그래서 도로시 마음대로! 문도 만들고~ 드림리스도 해치울 수 있답니다!
발랄한 얼굴로 문을 당긴 도로시가 어디에서 가지고 온 것인지 모를 꽃 한 송이를 내 가슴팍에 끼웠다.
오즈의 주민 전체를 이 세계로 데리고 올 수는 없었지만, 도로시는 정말 최선을 다했거든요.
하지만 도로시의 최선이 언제나 모두의 최선이 되는 건 아니니까... 어라라~?
도로시의 등 뒤에서 무언가 흉악한 그림자가 크게 일렁이자
열린 문틈 사이로 그녀가 내 등을 떠민다.
이런, 꿈꾸는 친구. 우리 조금 있다가 다시 만날까요~? 꽃 빼지 마요~ 도로시가 데리러 갈 테니까요!
With the Dreamless defeated, you look around for Dorothy again.
Perhaps she's hiding because of the Dreamless?
Perhaps she isn't hiding but the Dreamless have already...
No... she must be hiding. That's right! She's definitely hiding.
Right?
Why would you think that, Dreamer?
Dorothy pops up behind you, giving you a bit of a shock!
Oh, sorry Dreamer... I wasn't trying to scare you.
But I'm a little bit peeved that you think these weak Dreamless could take me down!
Ah! You're sorry... but you haven't been here long and you don't know how many, or what kind of Dreamless have invaded.
Well, I'll admit, some of them are pretty scary... but I haven't been hiding from them!
I've been trying to maintain this place as it has started to disintegrate.
That explains the feeling you had earlier... Is it because of the Dreamless?
Of course! The Dreamless as well as another... ummm, outside influence?
I created this dream as a refuge to hide from the Dreamless in Phantasia, but I wasn't expecting to see you here... twice, now!
But, wait... isn't this YOUR dream? The dream that Dracula forced you into?
Hmmm, yes, that is very strange... Perhaps the two dream worlds have collided somehow?
Or perhaps all of this is in your head, after all!
Or maybe it's all in mine and I'm back in my bed in Kansas.
Dreams can be very confusing, can't they, Dreamer?
Uhh, yes...
Wait, 'Kansas'?
Why does that name ring a bell to you...? Where was Dorothy originally from? Is Kansas in Phantasia somewhere?
Oh, no, I come from the realm of Oz... but Oz has long since fallen into the Dreamless Nether.
But... originally, I was from somewhere outside Phantasia.
Just like you, I think?
Well... you don't really know where you're from, originally.
But did Dorothy ever try to escape Phantasia and return to wherever she was from? Kansas, was it?
I did try... I used my silver slippers to transport me back to Kansas...
But during the transportation I became... stuck.
Stuck?
Yes... in the boundary around Phantasia...
I found I could go no further away from this world.
And while I was stuck there, I started to feel myself begin to... dissipate. I don't think I can really describe the feeling well.
Like I was a piece of ice slowly dissolving in a warm glass of lemonade?
That sounds terrible!
It was frightening... but it was also peaceful. And I thought I heard sounds and saw sights that might have been the world beyond Phantasia.
It didn't look like Kansas...
There were people moving, urgent voices, the wail of some kind of fearsome monster... an repetitive squeaking sound, like a very persistent mouse... and then...
And then?
And then time seemed to stop for me.
In that infinite moment, I somehow became aware that Oz was falling into the Dreamless Nether.
So, using all the strength and willpower I possessed, I wrenched myself out of that boundary, back towards Phantasia.
But I got back too late to save Oz... It had already broken away from Phantasia and was drifting away into the Nether, along with all its people
That's terrible... to lose so many people all at once...
I thought so, too. So... I had to do something, right?
What did she do?

I used up all my remaining strength, every bit of power I had in this world, and I created this place, this dreamworld. A place separated from Phantasia, but still linked to it and to where Oz had once stood.
It took everything I had, but I managed it.
But what about the people, where did they go?
The people are all around you, Dreamer, held in suspended animation in the fabric of this dream.
That's why everything here is so static and unchanging. It's all held, frozen in time, waiting for the time that all of Oz's people can return to Phantasia.
Though, that can only happen if Oz is restored...
The people of Oz have been trapped here since their realm was destroyed?
Yes... they don't know it, they can't feel anything. They're all frozen in an instant of time, supposedly unchanging. Supposedly...
But something has changed.
What?
Dorothy points.
Those Dreamless, they shouldn't be here.
